title: The Jesus Rope-a-Dope
description:
In the Gospel of Mark there's a strange miracle story where the miracle seems to only go half way the first time and then Jesus needs to finish the job. Ancient commentators see it as process. Modern commentators see it as limitation. Do we imagine God would dare to use process? 

Click here to meetup with other channel viewers for conversation https://discord.gg/WkkHMTt The link will prompt you to download the software for this free group messaging service. This link updates every 100 users so look for the most recent videos if this link doesn't work.
